seo.title: Vernazza Overview 2025 | Complete Guide to Cinque Terre's Jewel
seo.description: Complete guide to Vernazza, the most picturesque Cinque Terre village. Famous harbor, Doria Castle, best photography spots, and authentic Italian charm.

body.title: The Jewel of Cinque Terre
body.subtitle: The most photographed village with its iconic harbor, medieval castle, and colorful houses cascading to the sea. Vernazza captures the essence of Italian coastal beauty.

features.title: Most Photogenic
features.description: The iconic harbor view is Cinque Terre's most famous image.

features.title: Doria Castle
features.description: Climb the medieval tower for 360-degree coastal views.

features.title: Natural Harbor
features.description: The only protected natural port in Cinque Terre.

features.title: Wine Terraces
features.description: Surrounded by steep vineyards producing local white wines.

features.title: Harborside Dining
features.description: Exceptional restaurants with tables overlooking the sea.

features.title: Santa Margherita
features.description: Beautiful Gothic church from 1318 on the waterfront.
